name: Siddhgiri Tubes
overview:
Established in the year 2007, we, “Siddhgiri Tubes Pvt. Ltd.”, are an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Company a prominent name engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting the best-in-class range of Pipes, Fittings and Bars.

Our Products : Under this range, we offer Inconel 600 & 601 Products, Inconel 625 Products, Monel 400 Products, Hastelloy Products, Titanium Products, Cupro Nickel 70/30 & 90/10 Products, Duplex & Super Duplex Products, Copper Products, Brass Products and Stainless Steel Products. Along with this, we offer Inconel 600 & 601 Fittings, Sheets.

Our Team: Backed by an immensely experienced team of professionals, we are engaged in offering a qualitative range of Ferrous- Non Ferrous Metal & Stainless Steel Products. Including Pipes, Plates, Sheets, Fasteners and Fittings.

Quality Assurance: We have always been a quality conscious organization, striving to offer a flawless range of Ferrous- Non Ferrous Metal & Stainless Steel Products. Including Pipes, Plates, Sheets, Fasteners and Fittings.

Our Infrastructure: We have with us, an absolutely well-maintained infrastructure, sprawling over a vast area of land. The entire unit is segregated into various sub-units, in order to accelerate the production process and meet the clients requirements in a timely manner.

Client Satisfaction: We have always emphasized to serve our clients with a supreme quality range of Ferrous- Non Ferrous Metal & Stainless Steel Products. Including Pipes, Plates, Sheets, Fasteners and Fittings.
